reviews.text: With 5 platforms, a few shops before the ticket barriers, manned ticket booths + ticket machines and a helpful amount of staff on hand, this is a pretty good station
Staff are unapproachable. especially rude and unhelpful. Would not recommend.

Staff friendly and supportive. Regular trains to different destinations and staff always able to offer advise around beat routes and changes. 
Lift to platform. A couple of little. Shops a available before barriers. Rest rooms on platform.  Quick existing for when getting back to  bridges.
Parking is reasonably priced.  At available.  Never had to queue behind more than  two people. So quick easy polite servixe
Carpark facility full or shut most of the time.

Special shout out to Keith and Maciej at Three Bridges station for helping to recover a lost backpack (on a Thameslink train from Luton Aiport Parkway) containing quite a few valuables. Very friendly and went above and beyond their call of duty to ensure minimal stress! Thank you!
